member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.Expand
member.summary: Expand the panel. The panel must be in Collapsed or Collapsing state.
member.returns: True if can succcessfully start expanding; false otherwise.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.Collapse
member.summary: Collapse the panel. Panel must be in Open or Expanding states.
member.returns: True if can successfully start collapsing; false otherwise.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.switchState(FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState)
member.summary: Switches the current state of the panel, and fires StateChanged event, if there are any subscribers.
member.param: New state for the current panel.

member.name: E:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.StateChanged
member.summary: StateChanged event is fired when any change in the panel's state occurs. contain as Data.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of this panel in it's current state (changes while the panel expands / collapses)

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.MaxSize
member.summary: Get the size of this panel when it's fully expanded (Open state)

member.name: T:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState
member.summary: Panel states, returned by the StateChanged event. Initial state is "Collapsed".

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.Collapsed
member.summary: The panel is fully collapsed. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.ExpandingHorizontally
member.summary: The panel is expanding horizontally. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.ExpandingVertically
member.summary: The panel is finished expanding horizontally, and is now expanding vertically. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.Open
member.summary: The panel is fully expanded. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.CollapsingVertically
member.summary: The panel is collapsing vertically. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.CollapsingHorizontally
member.summary: The panel is finished collapsing vertically, and is now collapsing horizontally. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.summary: Creates a new panel housing a texture. Panel can be larger than the texture. Texture will be centered on the panel.

Panel size. Must be same size or larger than the texture it is housing.

The tint color of the panel.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.Reset(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reset the font to its initial state.
member.param: If true, () method is called right away.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.Reset
member.summary: Reset the font to its initial state.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.Slide
member.summary: Sets the font to visible and begins sliding towards the target position.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.TargetPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the target position (the position to slide to).

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.SlideSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance to slide.
member.remarks: The distance slided is calculated by multiplying the unit vector representing the direction from the position to the target positon by this speed by the time (in seconds) elapsed since the last frame. This value is further multiplied by the remaining distance to the target position. The final value is the distance that the sliding font moves forward.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.TargetTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance from the target position at which the will be considered as done moving.

member.name: T:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1
member.summary: A of objects that can notify via events when any object in the list reached a particular monitored state. This class will also notify subscribers when all objects in the list reached their monitored states.
member.typeparam: An object type that supports the interface, which this is a collection of.

member.summary: Stores s of monitored states and their types. Using a object ensures only one state being monitored per type.

member.summary: Stores boolean values in corresponding positions to the of objects.

member.summary: Creates a new . At least one pair of monitored State and Type is required. More can be added to the
member.param: State value to monitor for. Best choice is values.
Type of value being monitored, Example: typeof([enum]).
